page.title: 14KING ALFREDS SCHOOL
page.content:
King Alfred's School
King Alfreds School was built in 1956.There are about 1500 children in the school.84 full time teachers work in the school,it's the biggest Secondary school in Somerset. Children below the 5th form have to wear school uniform.School starts at 8:55 with morning break at 11:10 for 20 minutes,dinner is at 12:35 for an hour,and school ends at 3:45.Some of the sports activities include football,rugby,cricket,squash,tennis,b admington,basketball,archery,athletics ,gymnastics,dancing & hockey.There is a new sports centre next door,which is very popular.Many of the local people come here to keep fit.
